entry.title: Download a file from Wupload or Filesonic with curl
entry.content:
Wupload: bash curl -d "email=your@email.com&password=yourpassword&redirect=/file/159344782" -b cookies.txt -c cookies.txt www.wupload.com/account/login -L -o 20110910StokevsLiverpool1ertPachorriarte.mkv

Filesonic: bash curl -d "email=your@email.com&password=yourpassword&redirect=/file/2820172905" -b cookies.txt -c cookies.txt www.filesonic.com/user/login -L -o somevideo.wmv

entry.title: apr_poll timeout while running ab
entry.content:
If you get this error while running ab (ApacheBench) on your mac:

apr_poll: The timeout specified has expired (70007)

It may get fixed with:

bash sudo sysctl -w net.inet.ip.portrange.first=32768 sudo sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.msl=100

entry.title: Tunneling through SSH
entry.content: To tunnel through ssh do: bash ssh -v -nNT4 -R :4007:localhost:3000 myhost which maps the remote port 4007 to the local port 3000. myhost is the host you want to connect and it's a good idea to have it as an entry in your ssh config.
